items.sentence: Tom parked his car in the visitor parking lot.
Tom picked up one of his gloves and put it on.
No matter what happens, I\'ll always love you.
Tom can\'t remember when Mary moved to Boston.
When was the last time you had a tetanus shot?
Where were you planning to put all this stuff?
Where would you like us to put these supplies?
You\'ve decided to take the job, haven\'t you?
You\'ve got to help Tom or he\'s going to die.
An old man was practicing Tai Chi in the park.
Tom opened the door and held it open for Mary.
Tom opened the door to the interrogation room.
Tom pretended not to know anything about Mary.
Tom tried to make the best of a bad situation.
I hope to have that sort of opportunity again.
Why would Tom have any problem making friends?
I don\'t play the piano as often as I used to.
I don\'t really want to go to Boston with Tom.
Tom couldn\'t eat peanuts when he was a child.
Tom currently works for his father\'s company.
